column4: you cannot install other OS like windows XP when you already installed ubuntu right??
You may have to do some repartitioning but it's quite doable
Can you pastebin the output of compiz from your terminal to pastebin.org?
your drivers are using software rasterizer, pastebin your /var/log/Xorg.0.log
I've been trying to fix this via dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg but no help
The problem is [drm] failed to load kernel module "i915"
What does it say when you try sudo modprobe i915 ?
Seems like you have this old module lying around for some reason
I would move or rename this file first /lib/modules/2.6.31-20-generic/kernel/drivers/gpu/drm/i915/i915.ko so you know when you have it reinstalled
some said its the intel driver update
Reinstall linux-image package for your kernel version
